name: Basic Birthday Bliss
title: Keep it simple yet stylish with our Basic Package! Includes venue coordination, basic decorations, and delicious food options for a hassle-free celebration.

name: Standard Birthday Spectacular
title: Elevate your party experience with our comprehensive standard package, offering an array of features and enhancements to ensure a memorable and exciting celebration.

name: Premium Birthday Extravaganza
title: Immerse yourself in luxury and celebration excellence with our top-tier premium package, curated to provide the ultimate birthday experience filled with opulence, extravagance, and unforgettable moments.

name: Basic Casual Party
title: For relaxed gatherings, our Basic package offers simple decorations, snacks, and entertainment.

name: Standard Casual Party
title: Upgrade your celebration with enhanced décor, catering options, and entertainment choices

name: Premium Casual Party
title: Indulge in luxury with upscale decorations, gourmet catering, and premium entertainment.

name: Basic Wedding Package
title: Our Basic package provides essential elements for a beautiful wedding, including basic decorations, a simple catering menu, and standard services

name: Standard Wedding Package
title: Elevate your special day with our Standard package, featuring upgraded décor, a wider selection of catering options, and additional services to ensure a memorable celebration.

name: Premium Wedding Package
title: For an extraordinary wedding experience, our Premium package offers luxurious decorations, gourmet catering with exquisite menus, and top-tier services to create an unforgettable and magical day for you and your guests.

name: Custom Event Planning
title: Tailored to your unique vision, our Custom package offers personalized event coordination based on your specific preferences and requirements. From venue selection to decor, catering, entertainment, and more, we work closely with you to bring your dream event to life, ensuring every detail is executed to perfection.
